title: End of Tax Season Is Near, and Accountants Are (Almost) Ready
text:
You thought tax season concluded six months ago? Nope. The first round of individual tax filing under the new tax law is just now reaching its final stage, and the end of 14-hour days can’t come soon enough for the nation’s accountants.

Tax preparers are racing to complete individual tax returns due Oct. 15, which will finish tax year 2018 for the more than 15 million people who sought extensions from the mid-April deadline. A late flood of information from investment funds and tough judgment calls about new pieces of the...
description: You thought tax season ended six months ago? Nope. The first round of individual tax filing under the new law is just now reaching its final days, and the end can’t come soon enough for overburdened accountants.
